name: NanoDoom2d
description:
he came from darkness and marshmallows...

now all he has left is a will to survive.

controls:

keyboard / mouse : WASD move , left click = punch, right click = dash (when you pickup the ability) space = jump

gamepad : X = punch, Y = dash, A = jump

Game Programming & Art - banzaiMimic

Music & SFX - Crossedkiller
